mapper.select: select employee_no, dayoff_days as effect_day from employee join dayoff_create_terms dct on trunc(months_between(sysdate,hiredate)/12,0) = year_in_office
mapper.insert: insert into dayoff_create_recode values (#{employee_no}, sysdate, #{effect_day}, #{effect_day} + (select reward_dayoff+previous_dayoff from my_dayoff_recode where employee_no = #{employee_no}),1, #{dayoff_generator})
mapper.update: update my_dayoff_recode set annual_dayoff = #{effect_day} where employee_no = #{employee_no}
mapper.select: select * from dayoff_create_recode where employee_no = #{employee_no} and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') = to_char(generation_date,'yyyy') order by generation_date asc
